DOC.brief_summary: The objective study assess safety efficacy eculizumab hemolytic PNH patient . In addition , pharmacokinetics ( PK ) pharmacodynamic ( PD ) response eculizumab assess compare overseas study eculizumab treatment hemolytic PNH patient .
DOC.brief_title: C07-001 : Safety Efficacy Study Eculizumab Paroxysmal Nocturnal Hemoglobinuria Patients
DOC.criteria: Japanese individual least 12 year age Diagnosis PNH > 6 month One transfusion past two year anemia anemiarelated symptom LDH level > /= 1.5 x upper limit normal within 12 week Platelet count < 30,000/microliters Known suspect hereditary complement deficiency History hematopoietic stem cell transplant History meningococcal disease
